018package net.sf.hajdbc.cache.lazy;
019
020import java.lang.ref.Reference;
021import java.lang.ref.SoftReference;
022import java.sql.Connection;
023import java.sql.DatabaseMetaData;
024import java.sql.SQLException;
025import java.util.AbstractMap;
026import java.util.Map;
027
028import net.sf.hajdbc.Database;
029import net.sf.hajdbc.DatabaseCluster;
030import net.sf.hajdbc.DatabaseProperties;
031import net.sf.hajdbc.cache.DatabaseMetaDataCache;
032import net.sf.hajdbc.cache.DatabaseMetaDataSupport;
033import net.sf.hajdbc.cache.DatabaseMetaDataSupportFactory;
034import net.sf.hajdbc.dialect.Dialect;
035
036
037/**
038 * DatabaseMetaDataCache implementation that lazily caches data when requested.
039 * Used when a compromise between memory usage and performance is desired.
040 * Caches DatabaseProperties using a soft reference to prevent <code>OutOfMemoryError</code>s.
041 * 
042 * @author Paul Ferraro
043 * @since 2.0
044 */
045public class SharedLazyDatabaseMetaDataCache<Z, D extends Database<Z>> implements DatabaseMetaDataCache<Z, D>
046{
047        private final DatabaseCluster<Z, D> cluster;
048        private final DatabaseMetaDataSupportFactory factory;
049        
050        private volatile Reference<Map.Entry<DatabaseProperties, LazyDatabaseMetaDataProvider>> entryRef = new SoftReference<Map.Entry<DatabaseProperties, LazyDatabaseMetaDataProvider>>(null);
051        
052        public SharedLazyDatabaseMetaDataCache(DatabaseCluster<Z, D> cluster, DatabaseMetaDataSupportFactory factory)
053        {
054                this.cluster = cluster;
055                this.factory = factory;
056        }
057        
058        /**
059         * @see net.sf.hajdbc.cache.DatabaseMetaDataCache#flush()
060         */
061        @Override
062        public synchronized void flush()
063        {
064                this.entryRef.clear();
065        }
066
067        /**
068         * {@inheritDoc}
069         * @see net.sf.hajdbc.cache.DatabaseMetaDataCache#getDatabaseProperties(net.sf.hajdbc.Database, java.sql.Connection)
070         */
071        @Override
072        public DatabaseProperties getDatabaseProperties(D database, Connection connection) throws SQLException
073        {
074                Map.Entry<DatabaseProperties, LazyDatabaseMetaDataProvider> entry = this.entryRef.get();
075                
076                if (entry == null)
077                {
078                        DatabaseMetaData metaData = connection.getMetaData();
079                        Dialect dialect = this.cluster.getDialect();
080                        DatabaseMetaDataSupport support = this.factory.createSupport(metaData, dialect);
081                        LazyDatabaseMetaDataProvider provider = new LazyDatabaseMetaDataProvider(metaData);
082                        DatabaseProperties properties = new LazyDatabaseProperties(provider, support, dialect);
083                        
084                        entry = new AbstractMap.SimpleImmutableEntry<DatabaseProperties, LazyDatabaseMetaDataProvider>(properties, provider);
085                
086                        this.entryRef = new SoftReference<Map.Entry<DatabaseProperties, LazyDatabaseMetaDataProvider>>(entry);
087                }
088                else
089                {
090                        entry.getValue().setConnection(connection);
091                }
092                
093                return entry.getKey();
094        }
095}
